content.raw:
From a clean compilation running ```make REGRESSION_1208_world_plugin_init``` will not compile the libIssue1208Plugin and the test won't work. The following patch, should do the trick:

```
diff -r 4553932a1ac3 test/regression/CMakeLists.txt
--- a/test/regression/CMakeLists.txt	Wed Jul 09 14:54:35 2014 -0700
+++ b/test/regression/CMakeLists.txt	Thu Jul 10 05:57:57 2014 +0200
@@ -45,3 +45,5 @@
 )
 
 gz_build_dri_tests(${dri_tests})
+
+add_dependencies(${TEST_TYPE}_1208_world_plugin_init Issue1208Plugin)
```

A part from this, the test runs fine, please consider it approved.

From a clean compilation running make REGRESSION_1208_world_plugin_init will not compile the libIssue1208Plugin and the test won't work. The following patch, should do the trick:

diff -r 4553932a1ac3 test/regression/CMakeLists.txt
--- a/test/regression/CMakeLists.txt    Wed Jul 09 14:54:35 2014 -0700
+++ b/test/regression/CMakeLists.txt    Thu Jul 10 05:57:57 2014 +0200
@@ -45,3 +45,5 @@
 )

 gz_build_dri_tests(${dri_tests})
+
+add_dependencies(${TEST_TYPE}_1208_world_plugin_init Issue1208Plugin)

A part from this, the test runs fine, please consider it approved.
